content:
I'm actually working on a Lamborghini Countach model right now, which is a bit more challenging than my previous projects. I'm trying to get the engine and chassis details just right, and it's taking a lot longer than I expected. But I'm determined to get it perfect.

As for painting, I think I need to work on my airbrushing skills. I've been practicing, but it's still not as smooth as I'd like. I've been watching YouTube tutorials and reading online forums, but any additional tips would be appreciated.

I've also been collecting model building supplies and tools, and I recently ordered a new paint set online. I've been buying up model kits at a discount store that's going out of business, so I have a stash of about 10 kits that I'm looking forward to building over the next few months.
